item.title: k3s on arm64
item.description: I’m evaluating k3s a Lightweight Kubernetes on a rock64 (RK3328 Quad arm64). At the time of writing the stable release is k3s v0.4.0 Here are my notes: If you haven’t installed k3s with the install.sh, you may need to load some modules: br_netfilter and overlay Docker is not needed since k3s is using containerd but it seems I had to start docker to initialized the whole cgroups, at least on Arch For the Metrics API server to work you’ll need to start k3s with those args k3s server --kubelet-arg="address=0.
